attributes.description: This dashboard shows Incident logs collected by the Microsoft Sentinel integration.

params.markdown:
**Navigation**

**Microsoft Sentinel**  

- [Alert](#/dashboard/microsoft_sentinel-a9a3f6fc-876c-4aa1-98f3-6d41bbb7f852)  
- [**Incident (This Page)**](#/dashboard/microsoft_sentinel-c0a331fd-c7d9-452e-b5db-0f062479c779)  
- [Event](#/dashboard/microsoft_sentinel-bcfbf711-9fa2-4d98-aaec-1302e4ffd332)

**Overview**

This dashboard provides a detailed view of incident data across key fields such as severity, classification, and owner type. It includes visualizations like pie charts for incident severity, classification, and classification reasons, as well as a line chart for incident trends over time. Metrics for total active, closed, and new incidents offer a clear snapshot of current incident status. Additionally, tables highlight the top 10 incident owners and tactics, helping to track key stakeholders and threat patterns. The control panel allows centralized monitoring and management of incidents for efficient response.

[**Integrations Page**](/app/integrations/detail/microsoft_sentinel-0.1.0/overview)
